description: Add inline editing to TaskRow - click to edit title/times, Enter to save, Escape to cancel

userStories.title: Add editing state and refs to TaskRow
userStories.description: As a developer, I need state management for tracking which field is being edited and the temporary edit value.
acceptanceCriteria: Add useRef<HTMLInputElement> for managing input focus
Wire the previously unused onUpdate prop (remove underscore prefix)

userStories.title: Make title field editable inline
userStories.description: As a user, I want to click on a task title to edit it inline so I can quickly rename tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking task title enters edit mode with input field
Input is pre-filled with current title and auto-focused
Press Enter saves the new title via onUpdate
Press Escape cancels edit and reverts to display mode
Empty title is not allowed (reverts on Enter if empty)

userStories.title: Add parseTime utility for time input parsing
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a utility to parse user-entered time strings back to minutes.

userStories.title: Make estimated and consumed time fields editable
userStories.description: As a user, I want to click on time fields to edit them so I can track time estimates and consumption.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking estimated time column enters edit mode
Clicking consumed time column enters edit mode
Input uses parseTime to convert user input to minutes
Enter saves the parsed value via onUpdate
Input width matches column width (w-20 sm:w-28)

userStories.title: Add tests for TaskRow inline editing
userStories.description: As a developer, I want tests to verify inline editing behavior works correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: clicking title enters edit mode
Test: Enter key saves and exits edit mode
Test: time fields can be edited
